interest_acquired_percent.justification: Cosmo has signed a binding HoA to acquire 100% of the shares in a wholly owned subsidiary (Newco) of PTr Resources Pty Ltd (ACN 153 851 702) (PTR), the entity that holds the exploration licences comprising the Bingara and Nundle projects...

currency.justification: The buyer, Cosmo Metals, is an Australian company listed on the ASX (ASX: CMO), and financial figures are denoted with '$', implying Australian Dollars.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $925,000, calculated as half of the total potential cash consideration of $1,850,000 ($50,000 exclusivity fee, $250,000 completion cash, and up to $1,550,000 in contingent payments) for the two projects (Bingara and Nundle). The text states the consideration is for 'the Bingara and Nundle projects'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $950,000, calculated as half of the total share consideration of $1,900,000 ($450,000 in completion shares and $1,450,000 in deferred consideration shares) for the two projects (Bingara and Nundle). The text states the consideration is for 'the Bingara and Nundle projects'.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Separate cash and share payment values were identified, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The value of share payments was explicitly stated, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

issued_share_price.justification: The value of share payments was explicitly stated, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total commitment is $650,000, comprising $150,000 explicitly for the Bingara Project pre-completion ('fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project') and a $500,000 share of the post-completion commitment ('expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects'), which is split between the two projects.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Pre-Completion, fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project. Post Completion, expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects (Bingara and Nundle) in the 12 months immediately following Completion.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Pre-Completion, Cosmo has agreed to fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project... Post Completion, Cosmo has undertaken to use its best endeavours to expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects in the 12 months immediately following Completion.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The Seller will retain a net smelter royalty (NSR) of 1.5% on all commodities extracted from the projects.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Bingara Project, covering a contiguous area of 484.1km2, contains two sub parallel broadly north south trending mineralised trends that follow the regional scale Peel Fault system (Figure 2).

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Bingara Project, covering a contiguous area of 484.1km2...

resource_size.justification: The text explicitly states in multiple sections of the JORC table: 'There are no historical resource estimates reported in the news release.'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Cosmo Metals (ASX:CMO) has entered into a Binding Heads of Agreement to acquire 100% of the Bingara and Nundle gold - antimony and copper projects in the New England Orogen of northern NSW, subject to shareholder approval
